channel.title: Scala on Hack and Guitar
channel.description: Recent content in Scala on Hack and Guitar

item.title: Sbt换源
item.description: 1.只需要编辑 ~/.sbt/repositories文件，加入 [repositories] local aliyun: http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/ central: http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ 2.然后 sbt run -Dsbt.override.build.repos=true 主要是sbt后面的参数：-Dsbt.override
